# delegate

**Instance Property**

A delegate object that receives messages about the changes to the Apple Pay Later view.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor unowned(unsafe) var delegate: any PKPayLaterViewDelegate { get set }
```

## Responding to changes in the view’s height

- **PKPayLaterViewDelegate**: Methods the framework calls when the Apple Pay Later view’s size changes.
